article:
The class is the result of the parsing. It holds:
The Classes
The Individuals
The Datatypes
The Datatype properties
The Object properties
The schema alos have several boolean properties which set:
If the schema is empty
If the schema has
If the schema has foreign elements
If the schema has non foreign elements
If the schema has a default namespace
If the schema has a default prefix
It is possible to get the value of a property by using the method. The keys of the proeprties are defined in the interface.
